tool_description: Get resumes from jobspider by state and job keyword
title: Jobspider Resumes

api_list.name: Get
api_list.description: gets resumes from given state and keyword
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jobspider-resumes.p.rapidapi.com/{state}/{keyword}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jobspider-resumes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
